articles.author: Rob Williams
articles.title: Boeing shares edge higher as investigators study Air India 787 data: Barron's (BA:NYSE) - Seeking Alpha
articles.description: Boeing 787 crash investigation progresses as flight recorder data raises hopes for answers.
articles.content:
Ritesh Shukla/Getty Images News
Boeing (NYSE:BA) shares erased premarket gains to fall 2.5% Monday as the aviation world awaited new information from the flight recorders recovered after the deadly … [+64 chars]
